sen.j: 伏見宮 邦房 親王（ふしみのみや くにのぶ しんのう、永禄9年4月4日 (旧暦)（1566年4月23日） - 元和 (日本)7年11月25日 (旧暦)（1622年1月6日））は、戦国時代 (日本)から江戸時代初期の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Kuninobu FUSHIMINOMIYA (born April 23, 1566, died January 6, 1622) was a prince of imperial blood who lived from the Sengoku (warring states) period into the early Edo period.
sen.cmt: Since his proper name is Kuninobu, it seemed best to put that name first, before Fushiminomiya.
sen.e: Imperial Prince Kuninobu FUSHIMINOMIYA (born April 23, 1566, died January 6, 1622) was a prince of imperial blood who lived from the Sengoku (warring states) period into the early Edo period.
Imperial Prince Kuninobu FUSHIMINOMIYA (Mayl 3, 1566 - January 6, 1622) was a prince of imperial blood who lived from the Sengoku (warring states) period into the early Edo period.
sen.cmt: 日付表記グレゴリオ暦に変換

sen.e: He was the Shikibukyo (Lord of the Ministry of Ceremonial).
He was the Shikibukyo (Lord of the Ministry of Ceremonial).
He was the Shikibukyo (Lord of the Ministry of Ceremonial).
He was also the ninth head, in succession, of the Fushiminomiya family.
He was also the ninth head, in succession, of the Fushiminomiya family.
He was also the ninth head, in succession, of the Fushiminomiya family.

sen.j: 伏見宮第7代当主、伏見宮邦輔親王第三王子。
sen.e: Kuninobu was the third prince born to Imperial Prince Kunisuke FUSHIMINOMIYA.
Kuninobu was the third prince born to Imperial Prince Kunisuke FUSHIMINOMIYA.
Kuninobu was the third prince born to Imperial Prince Kunisuke FUSHIMINOMIYA, the seventh head, in succession, of the Fushiminomiya family.
sen.cmt: the seventh head, in succession, of the Fushiminomiya family補足

sen.e: He was raised to the rank of prince of imperial blood in an imperial proclamation dating to 1575.
He was raised to the rank of prince of imperial blood in an imperial proclamation dating to 1575.
He was raised to the rank of prince of imperial blood in an imperial proclamation dating to 1575.

sen.j: 王子女に、伏見宮貞清親王など。
sen.e: Kuninobu's children of princely blood included Imperial Prince Sadakiyo FUSHIMINOMIYA.
Kuninobu's children of princely blood included Imperial Prince Sadakiyo FUSHIMINOMIYA.
Kuninobu's children of princely blood included Imperial Prince Sadakiyo FUSHIMINOMIYA.
